EmailTemplate.name: Contest Winner Email
EmailTemplate.subject: A Story in Pictures: The Home Office Makeover
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=MBO Associate}},
Independent's day is here, and with it, the end of our First Annual Home Office Makeover Sweepstakes!
MBO Associates who referred a friend or colleague earned an official entry, with a chance to win some awesome gear for their home offices.
Check out our blog <http://www.mbopartners.com/blog/and-home-office-makeover-winner> to see the results, and follow our story as we turn a room in the luck winner's house into a top-of-the-line, high-tech office! ___________________________________ MBO Partners
t: 703-793-6000 e: communications@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
